lead_paragraph:
A day after a vintage tirade, John McEnroe was on his best behavior in his second match in the Hall of Fame Champions Cup in Newport, R.I. The 49-year-old McEnroe beat Karel Novacek, 6-3, 6-1, to improve to 1-1 in round-robin play in the grass-court event for players 30 and older.

On Thursday, McEnroe got tossed against MaliVai Washington for cursing, arguing with the chair umpire and making an obscene gesture at fans.
